price: “(Böyle iken) sen o yaptığın işi yaptın (adam öldürdün). Sen nankörlerdensin.”
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
